page.title: 07TURKISH BATHS
page.content: Every week 400 to 500 people spend Â£1.50 to attend the turkish baths to relax and bathe.Friday is the busiest day.Men and women use the baths on alternate days.In the summer more women attend than men- perhaps to prepare for holidays.A person gets hot steam for about 15 minutes then a cold dip for about 15 minutes then they pick a room with the temperature they prefer.The turkish baths has been open 21 years .The Langbaurgh council owns the turkish baths.The temperatures in the turkish baths are medium hot and very hot.Mr.Pipe has worked in the massage room for 15 years and he said he likes his job.It is one pound fifty pence to get in. by Michelle Luker,Alison Reynolds,Joanne Kirk and Nicola Youngs
